Description: The use of external control arms in clinical research is becoming mainstream
column3: especially in the context of real-world evidence (RWE).

Description: Advanced technologies like AI are being used for better predictions in disease progression and enhancing patient recruitment.
The FDA has established a new center focused on promoting the use of RWE in regulatory decision-making.
The FDA has released various guidance documents regarding the use of real-world data in drug evaluation.
Efforts are ongoing in Europe to streamline the incorporation of RWD and RWE in clinical evaluations.
